Package org.patrodyne.scripting.java

Class Summary
Execute Execute a program using the JavaCode script engine.
JavaCodeScriptEngine This is script engine for Java programming language.
JavaCodeScriptEngineFactory This is script engine factory for a "Java" script engine.
JavaCompiler Simple interface to Java compiler using JSR 199 Compiler API.
MemoryClassLoader An extension of URLClassLoader to store and load classes from memory.
MemoryJavaFileManager<FM extends JavaFileManager> This class is a JavaFileManager to store compiled byte code in a memory map.
